ArgonTest.Name: Method constrained type parameter - puts
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
trait Test <: Object static public proc _.printStringLike (T: type) (strLike: T) (requires erased ev: (T <: String)): () = puts strLike end
proc main(): () do Test.printStringLike String 'Hello Type Parameters' end
